articles.title: Co-founder of Möbius and Rockstar Leeds Gordon Hall dies at 51 - GamesRadar
articles.description: "I could fill books with our tales of our adventures – and the crazy thing is so could hundreds of others too"
articles.content:
Gordon Hall, co-founder of Rockstar Leeds, has died aged 51.
